TITLE: Episode 88 - The FDA is Not Your Friend, w/ Dr. Mary Ruwart
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie sit down with the Dr. Mary Ruwart to discuss her experience as a pharmaceutical researcher and how the FDA interferes in not so healthy ways. She is also the author of “Death by Regulation”, “Healing Our World” and “Short Answers To The Tough Questions”. Dr. Ruwart is also a public figure and activist in the liberty movement and ran for Presidential nomination in 2008 for libertarian party.
